title: MT5 Account Withdrawal Request
description: This call allows withdrawal from MT5 account to Binary account.

from_mt5.description: MT5 account login to withdraw money from

to_binary.description: Binary account loginid to transfer money to

passthrough.description: Optional field, used to pass data through the websocket, which may be retrieved via the echo_req output field.

req_id.description: Optional field to map request to response
